TopicTitle: Is there any ETA on fixing spaceport?

Articles.Content:
Title says it all.

Is spaceport in limbo never never land as far as getting it working or is there some firm plan to fix it?

I keep popping back to this sub forum and I keep seeing the same requests for mods to fix the same problems.

Will it get looked at for 0.24?

Please see: Devnote Tuesdays: The We're Going To Talk About Spaceport Edition

Basically it is hoped that there will be an announcement sometime today.
Spaceport is not getting fixed. You don't even want to try, it's too messy. We're going to hear about what I guess is a new spaceport soon according to the devnotes.

That would be good. Sometimes it`s just too much work to tidy up messy code and the best way is to start fresh and avoid keeping stuff that shouldn`t get kept.

Stops nasty surprises from hidden code later.

I`ll have a look at the notes.
